author: Staff Reporter
text:
A Special Sub-Inspector of Police was attacked by an unidentified gang during a clash at a Tasmac outlet here on Thursday. The SSI, Manickam, attached to Sanarpatti police station, was rushed to Dindigul Government Hospital with bleeding injuries.

Police said members of two gangs, all drunk, clashed in a Tasmac shop at Adhikaripatti near Dindigul. When the SSI tried to calm them down, they attacked him with lethal weapons. Acting on a complaint lodged by Tasmac outlet in-charge Shanmugam, Sanarpatti police have registered a case.
title: SSI attacked by gang
